altTitles.en: A Crow with a Glistening Trinket in Her Jet-Black Feathers
Lip-Service Woman and the Impregnable Maiden
ライカ、パブロフ、ポチハチ公

description.en:
A collection of six of Yotsuhara Furiko's short stories depicting the love between various girls. 

1. Laika, Pavlov, Pochihachikou
Set in a university, with Yuriko, a girl of the jou-sama type, being followed around by her puppy-like female friend Koroku. While eating lunch one day, Yuriko overhears some malicious gossip and her ensuing bad temper leads her to take Koroku to a hotel, where she tells her to do whatever she likes...
 
2. One Who Depicts Love

3. Lip-Service Woman and the Impregnable Maiden
Koyuki is known among her friends as a smooth talker, so her love confessions to Matsuri keep falling on deaf ears.

4. A Crow with a Glistening Trinket in Her Jet-Black Feathers
Oribe is surprised to meet her classmate Karatsu while browsing cutesy trinkets – who promptly flees the store when spotted. And Oribe soon finds herself in trouble when her love for cute things gets out of hand.

5. Koibumi Miman

6. Chopsticks
